page.title: 20HOME COMPUTERS IN LEOMINSTER
page.content: A survey made during the Summer Term 1985 produced the following results - Acorn Electron - 15 Vic 20 - 14 B.B.C.'B' - 13 Dragon 32 - 7 Commodre 16/64 - 37 Oric - 5 Sinclair comp. - 45 Einstein - 1 SHARP - 5 MSX - 1 436 children in{Leominster}Junior School were questioned - 143 had computers and 293 were without. Therefore just over 32% had computers for educational and games use. These computers ranged in price from below one hundred to nearly four hundred pounds. The school has at present three B.B.C.'B' computers - this being the most popular make purchased by schools generally. The Dept. of Education and Science gave schools a 50% grant to buy their first computer-others were bought by the Parent Teachers Assoc.
